282.desc: The wearer's primary attributes are increased by 1 for every five hero levels.

739.basicDesc:
{Basic Pathfinding}

Reduces the movement penalty for rough terrain:

Grass and Subterranean: by {5} move points
Dirt and Lava: by {10} move points
Rough: by {15} move points
Desert and Snow: by {20} move points
Swamp: by {25} move points
739.advancedDesc:
{Advanced Pathfinding}

Reduces the movement penalty for rough terrain:

Grass and Subterranean: by {10} move points
Dirt and Lava: by {20} move points
Rough: by {30} move points
Desert and Snow: by {40} move points
Swamp: by {50} move points
739.expertDesc:
{Expert Pathfinding}

Reduces the movement penalty for rough terrain:

Grass and Subterranean: by {15} move points
Dirt and Lava: by {30} move points
Rough: by {45} move points
Desert and Snow: by {60} move points
Swamp: by {75} move points

747.basicDesc: {10%} of unused movement points convert to experience points.
747.advancedDesc: {20%} of unused movement points convert to experience points.
747.expertDesc: {30%} of unused movement points convert to experience points.

752.desc: Evades indirect attacks and damaging spells.

756.name: {Siegecraft}
756.basicDesc: Increases moat and tower damage by {+10%} when under siege.
756.advancedDesc: Increases moat and tower damage by {+10%} when under siege.
756.expertDesc: Increases moat and tower damage by {+30%} when under siege.

758.desc: No morale from heroes. Gets bloodthirsty from killing an enemy.

762.battleLog: @flesheater@ eat the remains of their enemies and restore themselves!

773.basicDesc:
{Basic Navigation}

Increases the hero's basic movement points when he/she is in a boat by {10%}. Reduces the cost of movement points when boarding/landing the boat by {100} MP.
773.advancedDesc:
{Advanced Navigation}

Increases the hero's basic movement points when he/she is in a boat by {20%}. Reduces the cost of movement points when boarding/landing the boat by {200} MP.
773.expertDesc:
{Expert Navigation}

Increases the hero's basic movement points when he/she is in a boat by {30%}. Reduces the cost of movement points when boarding/landing the boat by {300} MP.
773.spec:
{Navigation}

Increases the Navigation skill by 5% per level. Reduces the cost of movement points when boarding/landing the boat by another {100} MP.
773.logSpec:
{Logistics}

Receives 5% per level bonus to Logistics skill percentage.

776.name: {El. Suppression}
776.basicDesc:
{Basic El. Suppression}

Reduces the mastery of an opponent in all schools of magic skills by {1} level.
776.advancedDesc:
{Advanced El. Suppression}

Reduces the mastery of an opponent in all schools of magic skills by {2} levels.
776.expertDesc:
{Expert El. Suppression}

Reduces the mastery of an opponent in all schools of magic skills by {3} levels.
776.neutralized: This is neutralized by any "suppressing artifacts" and {Elemental Suppression} skill of the enemy.
776.sepc:
{Elemental Suppression}

Acts like an additional level of the {Elemental Suppression} skill.
776.artDesc1: Reduces the mastery of an opponent in all schools of magic skills by {1} level.
776.artDesc2: Reduces the mastery of an opponent in all schools of magic skills by {2} levels.

777.basicDesc: Reduces magic damage received for heroes armies by {5}%.
777.advancedDesc: Reduces magic damage received for heroes armies by {10}%.
777.expertDesc: Reduces magic damage received for heroes armies by {15}%.

782.name: {Medicine}
782.basicDesc:
{Basic Medicine}

Increases the health of living creatures in the hero's army by {1}. Allows you to control a First Aid Tent healing {26-50} points of damage to the selected unit.
782.advancedDesc:
{Advanced Medicine}

Increases the health of living creatures in the hero's army by {2}. Allows you to control a First Aid Tent healing {51-75} points of damage to the selected unit.
782.expertDesc:
{Expert Medicine}

Increases the health of living creatures in the hero's army by {3}. Allows you to control a First Aid Tent healing {76-100} points of damage to the selected unit.
782.spec:
{Medicine}

Increases the health of living creatures in the hero's army by {1} unit. First Aid Tent healing increases increases by {25} points.
782.battleLog: First Aid Tent healing is increased by @hp@ points.

787.basicDesc:
{Basic Mysticism}

Allows you to additionally restore spell points:

Up to {3% (minimum of 1)} per night when outside a town.
Up to {20% (minimum of 20)} when visiting a magic well or spending the night in a town with a Mage Guild.
787.advancedDesc:
{Advanced Mysticism}

Allows you to additionally restore spell points:

Up to {6% (minimum of 2)} per night when outside a town.
Up to {40% (minimum of 40)} when visiting a magic well or spending the night in a town with a Mage Guild.
787.expertDesc:
{Expert Mysticism}

Allows you to additionally restore spell points:

Up to {9% (minimum of 3)} per night when outside a town.
Up to {60% (minimum of 60)} when visiting a magic well or spending the night in a town with a Mage Guild.
787.spec:
{Mysticism}

Allows you to additionally restore spell points:

Up to {3% (minimum of 1)} per night when outside a town.
Up to {20% (minimum of 20)} when visiting a magic well or spending the night in a town with a Mage Guild.
787.charmDesc:
{Charm} {of} {Mana}

Allows you to additionally restore spell points:

Up to {3% (minimum of 1)} per night when outside a town.
Up to {20% (minimum of 20)} when visiting a magic well or spending the night in a town with a Mage Guild.
787.tailsmanDesc:
{Talisman} {of} {Mana}

Allows you to additionally restore spell points:

Up to {6% (minimum of 2)} per night when outside a town.
Up to {40% (minimum of 40)} when visiting a magic well or spending the night in a town with a Mage Guild.
787.orbDesc:
{Mystic} {Orb} {of} {Mana}

Allows you to additionally restore spell points:

Up to {9% (minimum of 3)} per night when outside a town.
Up to {60% (minimum of 60)} when visiting a magic well or spending the night in a town with a Mage Guild.

793.name: {Economy}
793.basicDesc:
{Basic Economy}

Increases the daily income of towns by 5%.
793.advancedDesc:
{Advanced Economy}

Increases the daily income of towns by 10%.
793.expertDesc:
{Expert Economy}

Increases the daily income of towns by 15%.
793.spec:
{Economy}

Economy Specialists increase the daily income of towns by 5%
